outcome.title: Terms and factors
outcome.description: I can identify terms and factors. I can combine like terms and factor out common factors.

outcome.title: Functions
outcome.description: I can use function notation, find and simplify the output of a function given an input, and find an input that produces a given output; I can do this for functions given by a formula, a table, and a graph.

outcome.title: Average rate of change
outcome.description: I can find the average rate of change (AROC) of a function on a given interval. In an applied context, I can state the units and interpret the real-world meaning of the AROC.

outcome.title: Linear functions
outcome.description: I can find the slope of a linear function and find equations for the function in point-slope and slope-intercept form.

outcome.title: Generating circular functions
outcome.description: I can generate an accurate, labeled graph of a circular function given appropriate information about the circle being traversed, and describe key features of the function.

outcome.title: Transforming circular functions
outcome.description: I can find the amplitude, period, and midline of a transformed version of the basic sine or cosine function; and I can find the formulas for transformed versions of the basic sine or cosine function.

outcome.title: Fitting exponential functions
outcome.description: I can find the formula for an exponential function given two data points.

outcome.title: Features of exponential functions
outcome.description: I can describe the long-term behavior of an exponential function or a transformed version of an exponential function. I can tell whether the function is increasing, decreasing, concave up, or concave down.

outcome.title: Using exponential and logarithmic expressions
outcome.description: I can solve equations involving exponential and logarithmic expressions. I can apply the properties of exponential and logarithmic functions to simplify expressions.

outcome.title: Sine, cosine, and tangent
outcome.description: I can find the values of sine, cosine, and tangent at special points on the unit circle or for angles in a right triangle with labeled sides.

outcome.title: Arcsine, arccosine, and arctangent
outcome.description: I can compute the values of the arcsine, arccosine, and arctangent functions for inputs arising from the unit circle or a labeled right triangle.
